37const char* const AsmJs::kSingleFunctionName = "__single_function__";
38
39namespace {
40
41Handle<Object> StdlibMathMember(Isolate* isolate, Handle<JSReceiver> stdlib,
42 Handle<Name> name) {
43 Handle<Name> math_name(
44 isolate->factory()->InternalizeString(base::StaticCharVector("Math")));
45 Handle<Object> math = JSReceiver::GetDataProperty(isolate, stdlib, math_name);
46 if (!IsJSReceiver(*math)) return isolate->factory()->undefined_value();
47 Handle<JSReceiver> math_receiver = Handle<JSReceiver>::cast(math);
48 Handle<Object> value =
49 JSReceiver::GetDataProperty(isolate, math_receiver, name);
50 return value;
51}
52
53bool AreStdlibMembersValid(Isolate* isolate, Handle<JSReceiver> stdlib,
54 wasm::AsmJsParser::StdlibSet members,
55 bool* is_typed_array) {
56 if (members.contains(wasm::AsmJsParser::StandardMember::kInfinity)) {
57 members.Remove(wasm::AsmJsParser::StandardMember::kInfinity);
58 Handle<Name> name = isolate->factory()->Infinity_string();
59 Handle<Object> value = JSReceiver::GetDataProperty(isolate, stdlib, name);
60 if (!IsNumber(*value) || !std::isinf(Object::Number(*value))) return false;
61 }
62 if (members.contains(wasm::AsmJsParser::StandardMember::kNaN)) {
63 members.Remove(wasm::AsmJsParser::StandardMember::kNaN);
64 Handle<Name> name = isolate->factory()->NaN_string();
65 Handle<Object> value = JSReceiver::GetDataProperty(isolate, stdlib, name);
66 if (!IsNaN(*value)) return false;
67 }
68#define STDLIB_MATH_FUNC(fname, FName, ignore1, ignore2) \
69 if (members.contains(wasm::AsmJsParser::StandardMember::kMath##FName)) { \
70 members.Remove(wasm::AsmJsParser::StandardMember::kMath##FName); \
71 Handle<Name> name(isolate->factory()->InternalizeString( \
72 base::StaticCharVector(#fname))); \
73 Handle<Object> value = StdlibMathMember(isolate, stdlib, name); \
74 if (!IsJSFunction(*value)) return false; \
75 Tagged<SharedFunctionInfo> shared = \
76 Handle<JSFunction>::cast(value)->shared(); \
77 if (!shared->HasBuiltinId() || \
78 shared->builtin_id() != Builtin::kMath##FName) { \
79 return false; \
80 } \
81 DCHECK_EQ(shared->GetCode(isolate), \
82 isolate->builtins()->code(Builtin::kMath##FName)); \
83 }
84 STDLIB_MATH_FUNCTION_LIST(STDLIB_MATH_FUNC)
85#undef STDLIB_MATH_FUNC
86#define STDLIB_MATH_CONST(cname, const_value) \
87 if (members.contains(wasm::AsmJsParser::StandardMember::kMath##cname)) { \
88 members.Remove(wasm::AsmJsParser::StandardMember::kMath##cname); \
89 Handle<Name> name(isolate->factory()->InternalizeString( \
90 base::StaticCharVector(#cname))); \
91 Handle<Object> value = StdlibMathMember(isolate, stdlib, name); \
92 if (!IsNumber(*value) || Object::Number(*value) != const_value) \
93 return false; \
94 }
95 STDLIB_MATH_VALUE_LIST(STDLIB_MATH_CONST)
96#undef STDLIB_MATH_CONST
97#define STDLIB_ARRAY_TYPE(fname, FName) \
98 if (members.contains(wasm::AsmJsParser::StandardMember::k##FName)) { \
99 members.Remove(wasm::AsmJsParser::StandardMember::k##FName); \
100 *is_typed_array = true; \
101 Handle<Name> name(isolate->factory()->InternalizeString( \
102 base::StaticCharVector(#FName))); \
103 Handle<Object> value = JSReceiver::GetDataProperty(isolate, stdlib, name); \
104 if (!IsJSFunction(*value)) return false; \
105 Handle<JSFunction> func = Handle<JSFunction>::cast(value); \
106 if (!func.is_identical_to(isolate->fname())) return false; \
107 }
108 STDLIB_ARRAY_TYPE(int8_array_fun, Int8Array)
109 STDLIB_ARRAY_TYPE(uint8_array_fun, Uint8Array)
110 STDLIB_ARRAY_TYPE(int16_array_fun, Int16Array)
111 STDLIB_ARRAY_TYPE(uint16_array_fun, Uint16Array)
112 STDLIB_ARRAY_TYPE(int32_array_fun, Int32Array)
113 STDLIB_ARRAY_TYPE(uint32_array_fun, Uint32Array)
114 STDLIB_ARRAY_TYPE(float32_array_fun, Float32Array)
115 STDLIB_ARRAY_TYPE(float64_array_fun, Float64Array)
116#undef STDLIB_ARRAY_TYPE
117 // All members accounted for.
118 DCHECK(members.empty());
119 return true;
120}
121
122void Report(Handle<Script> script, int position, base::Vector<const char> text,
123 MessageTemplate message_template,
124 v8::Isolate::MessageErrorLevel level) {
125 Isolate* isolate = script->GetIsolate();
126 MessageLocation location(script, position, position);
127 Handle<String> text_object = isolate->factory()->InternalizeUtf8String(text);
128 Handle<JSMessageObject> message = MessageHandler::MakeMessageObject(
129 isolate, message_template, &location, text_object,
130 Handle<FixedArray>::null());
131 message->set_error_level(level);
132 MessageHandler::ReportMessage(isolate, &location, message);
133}
134
135// Hook to report successful execution of {AsmJs::CompileAsmViaWasm} phase.
136void ReportCompilationSuccess(Handle<Script> script, int position,
137 double compile_time, size_t module_size) {
138 if (v8_flags.suppress_asm_messages || !v8_flags.trace_asm_time) return;
139 base::EmbeddedVector<char, 100> text;
140 int length = SNPrintF(text, "success, compile time %0.3f ms, %zu bytes",
141 compile_time, module_size);
142 CHECK_NE(-1, length);
143 text.Truncate(length);
144 Report(script, position, text, MessageTemplate::kAsmJsCompiled,
145 v8::Isolate::kMessageInfo);
146}
147
148// Hook to report failed execution of {AsmJs::CompileAsmViaWasm} phase.
149void ReportCompilationFailure(ParseInfo* parse_info, int position,
150 const char* reason) {
151 if (v8_flags.suppress_asm_messages) return;
152 parse_info->pending_error_handler()->ReportWarningAt(
153 position, position, MessageTemplate::kAsmJsInvalid, reason);
154}
155
156// Hook to report successful execution of {AsmJs::InstantiateAsmWasm} phase.
157void ReportInstantiationSuccess(Handle<Script> script, int position,
158 double instantiate_time) {
159 if (v8_flags.suppress_asm_messages || !v8_flags.trace_asm_time) return;
160 base::EmbeddedVector<char, 50> text;
161 int length = SNPrintF(text, "success, %0.3f ms", instantiate_time);
162 CHECK_NE(-1, length);
163 text.Truncate(length);
164 Report(script, position, text, MessageTemplate::kAsmJsInstantiated,
165 v8::Isolate::kMessageInfo);
166}
167
168// Hook to report failed execution of {AsmJs::InstantiateAsmWasm} phase.
169void ReportInstantiationFailure(Handle<Script> script, int position,
170 const char* reason) {
171 if (v8_flags.suppress_asm_messages) return;
172 base::Vector<const char> text = base::CStrVector(reason);
173 Report(script, position, text, MessageTemplate::kAsmJsLinkingFailed,
174 v8::Isolate::kMessageWarning);
175}
176
177} // namespace
178
179// The compilation of asm.js modules is split into two distinct steps:
180// [1] ExecuteJobImpl: The asm.js module source is parsed, validated, and
181// translated to a valid WebAssembly module. The result are two vectors
182// representing the encoded module as well as encoded source position
183// information and a StdlibSet bit set.
184// [2] FinalizeJobImpl: The module is handed to WebAssembly which decodes it
185// into an internal representation and eventually compiles it to machine
186// code.
187class AsmJsCompilationJob final : public UnoptimizedCompilationJob {
188 public:
189 explicit AsmJsCompilationJob(ParseInfo* parse_info, FunctionLiteral* literal,
190 AccountingAllocator* allocator)
191 : UnoptimizedCompilationJob(parse_info->stack_limit(), parse_info,
192 &compilation_info_),
193 allocator_(allocator),
194 zone_(allocator, ZONE_NAME),
195 compilation_info_(&zone_, parse_info, literal),
196 module_(nullptr),
197 asm_offsets_(nullptr),
198 compile_time_(0),
199 module_source_size_(0) {}
200
201 AsmJsCompilationJob(const AsmJsCompilationJob&) = delete;
202 AsmJsCompilationJob& operator=(const AsmJsCompilationJob&) = delete;
203
204 protected:
205 Status ExecuteJobImpl() final;
206 Status FinalizeJobImpl(Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> shared_info,
207 Isolate* isolate) final;
208 Status FinalizeJobImpl(Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> shared_info,
209 LocalIsolate* isolate) final {
210 return CompilationJob::RETRY_ON_MAIN_THREAD;
211 }
212
213 private:
214 void RecordHistograms(Isolate* isolate);
215
216 AccountingAllocator* allocator_;
217 Zone zone_;
218 UnoptimizedCompilationInfo compilation_info_;
219 wasm::ZoneBuffer* module_;
220 wasm::ZoneBuffer* asm_offsets_;
221 wasm::AsmJsParser::StdlibSet stdlib_uses_;
222
223 double compile_time_; // Time (milliseconds) taken to execute step [2].
224 int module_source_size_; // Module source size in bytes.
225};
226
227UnoptimizedCompilationJob::Status AsmJsCompilationJob::ExecuteJobImpl() {
228 DisallowHeapAccess no_heap_access;
229
230 // Step 1: Translate asm.js module to WebAssembly module.
231 Zone* compile_zone = &zone_;
232 Zone translate_zone(allocator_, ZONE_NAME);
233
234 Utf16CharacterStream* stream = parse_info()->character_stream();
235 base::Optional<AllowHandleDereference> allow_deref;
236 if (stream->can_access_heap()) {
237 allow_deref.emplace();
238 }
239 stream->Seek(compilation_info()->literal()->start_position());
240 wasm::AsmJsParser parser(&translate_zone, stack_limit(), stream);
241 if (!parser.Run()) {
242 if (!v8_flags.suppress_asm_messages) {
243 ReportCompilationFailure(parse_info(), parser.failure_location(),
244 parser.failure_message());
245 }
246 return FAILED;
247 }
248 module_ = compile_zone->New<wasm::ZoneBuffer>(compile_zone);
249 parser.module_builder()->WriteTo(module_);
250 asm_offsets_ = compile_zone->New<wasm::ZoneBuffer>(compile_zone);
251 parser.module_builder()->WriteAsmJsOffsetTable(asm_offsets_);
252 stdlib_uses_ = *parser.stdlib_uses();
253
254 module_source_size_ = compilation_info()->literal()->end_position() -
255 compilation_info()->literal()->start_position();
256 return SUCCEEDED;
257}
258
259UnoptimizedCompilationJob::Status AsmJsCompilationJob::FinalizeJobImpl(
260 Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> shared_info, Isolate* isolate) {
261 // Step 2: Compile and decode the WebAssembly module.
262 base::ElapsedTimer compile_timer;
263 compile_timer.Start();
264
265 Handle<HeapNumber> uses_bitset =
266 isolate->factory()->NewHeapNumberFromBits(stdlib_uses_.ToIntegral());
267
268 // The result is a compiled module and serialized standard library uses.
269 wasm::ErrorThrower thrower(isolate, "AsmJs::Compile");
270 Handle<Script> script(Script::cast(shared_info->script()), isolate);
271 Handle<AsmWasmData> result =
272 wasm::GetWasmEngine()
273 ->SyncCompileTranslatedAsmJs(
274 isolate, &thrower,
275 wasm::ModuleWireBytes(module_->begin(), module_->end()), script,
276 base::VectorOf(*asm_offsets_), uses_bitset,
277 shared_info->language_mode())
278 .ToHandleChecked();
279 DCHECK(!thrower.error());
280 compile_time_ = compile_timer.Elapsed().InMillisecondsF();
281
282 compilation_info()->SetAsmWasmData(result);
283
284 RecordHistograms(isolate);
285 ReportCompilationSuccess(script, shared_info->StartPosition(), compile_time_,
286 module_->size());
287 return SUCCEEDED;
288}
289
290void AsmJsCompilationJob::RecordHistograms(Isolate* isolate) {
291 isolate->counters()->asm_module_size_bytes()->AddSample(module_source_size_);
292}
293
294std::unique_ptr<UnoptimizedCompilationJob> AsmJs::NewCompilationJob(
295 ParseInfo* parse_info, FunctionLiteral* literal,
296 AccountingAllocator* allocator) {
297 return std::make_unique<AsmJsCompilationJob>(parse_info, literal, allocator);
298}
299
300namespace {
301inline bool IsValidAsmjsMemorySize(size_t size) {
302 // Enforce asm.js spec minimum size.
303 if (size < (1u << 12u)) return false;
304 // Enforce engine-limited and flag-limited maximum allocation size.
305 if (size > wasm::max_mem32_bytes()) return false;
306 // Enforce power-of-2 sizes for 2^12 - 2^24.
307 if (size < (1u << 24u)) {
308 uint32_t size32 = static_cast<uint32_t>(size);
309 return base::bits::IsPowerOfTwo(size32);
310 }
311 // Enforce multiple of 2^24 for sizes >= 2^24
312 if ((size % (1u << 24u)) != 0) return false;
313 // Limitation of our implementation: for performance reasons, we use unsigned
314 // uint32-to-uintptr extensions for memory addresses, which would give
315 // incorrect behavior for memories larger than 2 GiB.
316 // Note that this does not affect Chrome, which does not allow allocating
317 // larger ArrayBuffers anyway.
318 if (size > 0x8000'0000u) return false;
319 // All checks passed!
320 return true;
321}
322} // namespace
323
324MaybeHandle<Object> AsmJs::InstantiateAsmWasm(Isolate* isolate,
325 Handle<SharedFunctionInfo> shared,
326 Handle<AsmWasmData> wasm_data,
327 Handle<JSReceiver> stdlib,
328 Handle<JSReceiver> foreign,
329 Handle<JSArrayBuffer> memory) {
330 base::ElapsedTimer instantiate_timer;
331 instantiate_timer.Start();
332 Handle<HeapNumber> uses_bitset(wasm_data->uses_bitset(), isolate);
333 Handle<Script> script(Script::cast(shared->script()), isolate);
334 auto* wasm_engine = wasm::GetWasmEngine();
335
336 // Allocate the WasmModuleObject.
337 Handle<WasmModuleObject> module =
338 wasm_engine->FinalizeTranslatedAsmJs(isolate, wasm_data, script);
339
340 // TODO(asmjs): The position currently points to the module definition
341 // but should instead point to the instantiation site (more intuitive).
342 int position = shared->StartPosition();
343
344 // Check that the module is not instantiated as a generator or async function.
345 if (IsResumableFunction(shared->scope_info()->function_kind())) {
346 ReportInstantiationFailure(script, position,
347 "Cannot be instantiated as resumable function");
348 return MaybeHandle<Object>();
349 }
350
351 // Check that all used stdlib members are valid.
352 bool stdlib_use_of_typed_array_present = false;
353 wasm::AsmJsParser::StdlibSet stdlib_uses =
354 wasm::AsmJsParser::StdlibSet::FromIntegral(uses_bitset->value_as_bits());
355 if (!stdlib_uses.empty()) { // No checking needed if no uses.
356 if (stdlib.is_null()) {
357 ReportInstantiationFailure(script, position, "Requires standard library");
358 return MaybeHandle<Object>();
359 }
360 if (!AreStdlibMembersValid(isolate, stdlib, stdlib_uses,
361 &stdlib_use_of_typed_array_present)) {
362 ReportInstantiationFailure(script, position, "Unexpected stdlib member");
363 return MaybeHandle<Object>();
364 }
365 }
366
367 // Check that a valid heap buffer is provided if required.
368 if (stdlib_use_of_typed_array_present) {
369 if (memory.is_null()) {
370 ReportInstantiationFailure(script, position, "Requires heap buffer");
371 return MaybeHandle<Object>();
372 }
373 // AsmJs memory must be an ArrayBuffer.
374 if (memory->is_shared()) {
375 ReportInstantiationFailure(script, position,
376 "Invalid heap type: SharedArrayBuffer");
377 return MaybeHandle<Object>();
378 }
379 // We don't allow resizable ArrayBuffers because resizable ArrayBuffers may
380 // shrink, and then asm.js does out of bounds memory accesses.
381 if (memory->is_resizable_by_js()) {
382 ReportInstantiationFailure(script, position,
383 "Invalid heap type: resizable ArrayBuffer");
384 return MaybeHandle<Object>();
385 }
386 // We don't allow WebAssembly.Memory, because WebAssembly.Memory.grow()
387 // detaches the ArrayBuffer, and that would invalidate the asm.js module.
388 if (memory->GetBackingStore() &&
389 memory->GetBackingStore()->is_wasm_memory()) {
390 ReportInstantiationFailure(script, position,
391 "Invalid heap type: WebAssembly.Memory");
392 return MaybeHandle<Object>();
393 }
394 size_t size = memory->byte_length();
395 // Check the asm.js heap size against the valid limits.
396 if (!IsValidAsmjsMemorySize(size)) {
397 ReportInstantiationFailure(script, position, "Invalid heap size");
398 return MaybeHandle<Object>();
399 }
400 // Mark the buffer as undetachable. This implies that the buffer cannot be
401 // postMessage()'d, as that detaches the buffer.
402 memory->set_is_detachable(false);
403 } else {
404 memory = Handle<JSArrayBuffer>::null();
405 }
406
407 wasm::ErrorThrower thrower(isolate, "AsmJs::Instantiate");
408 MaybeHandle<WasmInstanceObject> maybe_instance =
409 wasm_engine->SyncInstantiate(isolate, &thrower, module, foreign, memory);
410 if (maybe_instance.is_null()) {
411 // Clear a possible stack overflow from function entry that would have
412 // bypassed the {ErrorThrower}. Be careful not to clear a termination
413 // exception.
414 if (isolate->is_execution_terminating()) return {};
415 if (isolate->has_exception()) isolate->clear_exception();
416 if (thrower.error()) {
417 base::ScopedVector<char> error_reason(100);
418 SNPrintF(error_reason, "Internal wasm failure: %s", thrower.error_msg());
419 ReportInstantiationFailure(script, position, error_reason.begin());
420 } else {
421 ReportInstantiationFailure(script, position, "Internal wasm failure");
422 }
423 thrower.Reset(); // Ensure exceptions do not propagate.
424 return {};
425 }
426 DCHECK(!thrower.error());
427 Handle<WasmInstanceObject> instance = maybe_instance.ToHandleChecked();
428
429 ReportInstantiationSuccess(script, position,
430 instantiate_timer.Elapsed().InMillisecondsF());
431
432 Handle<Name> single_function_name(
433 isolate->factory()->InternalizeUtf8String(AsmJs::kSingleFunctionName));
434 MaybeHandle<Object> single_function =
435 Object::GetProperty(isolate, instance, single_function_name);
436 if (!single_function.is_null() &&
437 !IsUndefined(*single_function.ToHandleChecked(), isolate)) {
438 return single_function;
439 }
440
441 // Here we rely on the fact that the exports object is eagerly created.
442 // The following check is a weak indicator for that. If this ever changes,
443 // then we'll have to call the "exports" getter, and be careful about
444 // handling possible stack overflow exceptions.
445 DCHECK(IsJSObject(instance->exports_object()));
446 return handle(instance->exports_object(), isolate);
447}
